tool.name: MISA to Primer3 Input Converter
tool.description: Identification and localization of perfect microsatellites as well as compound microsatellites

param.name: input_misa
param.label: MISA's Output File
param.help: Select the tab separated file that misa generates.

param.name: input_fasta
param.label: Fasta File Provided to MISA
param.help: Select the Fasta file you provided to MISA.

tool.help:
**Tool Information**
MISA to Primer3 Input Converter v1.0
**Author**
Iyad Kandalaft iyad.kandalaft@agr.gc.ca Agriculture and Agri-foods Canada Ottawa, ON, Canada
**Description**
Converts MISA output into a Primer3 input file containing Primer3 directives to create flanking primers.
**Inputs and Outputs**
- Input - Accepts MISA's tabular output file and FASTA file as input - Output - Produces a Primer3 input file with directives to create flanking primers.
